--- select_literals_float.sql
SELECT
  123.456e-3,
  .1E4,
  58.,
  4e2

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.FloatLiteral{
          ValuePos: 9,
          ValueEnd: 19,
          Value:    "123.456e-3",
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.FloatLiteral{
          ValuePos: 23,
          ValueEnd: 27,
          Value:    ".1E4",
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.FloatLiteral{
          ValuePos: 31,
          ValueEnd: 34,
          Value:    "58.",
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.FloatLiteral{
          ValuePos: 38,
          ValueEnd: 41,
          Value:    "4e2",
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT 123.456e-3, .1E4, 58., 4e2
